name: Scott Mitting
title: Freelance Software Developer & Entrepreneur
summary: Full-stack software developer and entrepreneur with a focus on AI and machine learning solutions for small businesses. Experienced in developing custom software, AI models, and automation systems that help small businesses compete with larger corporations. Strong foundation in computer science with a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technology to solve real-world business problems.

education.details: Specialized coursework in genetic algorithms and artificial intelligence.

responsibilities: Develop AI-powered solutions for small businesses to enhance their operational efficiency and competitive edge.
Create custom software applications focused on automation, data analysis, and machine learning.
Consult with clients to identify opportunities for technology-driven business improvements.
Design and implement neural networks and language models tailored to specific business needs.
